properties.entry: select code, count(*) from anno_ontology_concept o inner join anno_base b on b.anno_base_id = o.anno_base_id inner join document d on d.document_id = b.document_id where d.analysis_batch in ('i2b2.2008') group by code
select cui1, cui2 from umls.MRREL where sab in ('RXNORM', 'SNOMEDCT', 'SRC') and rel in ('PAR', 'RB')
select d.docId, a.judgement, 1, a.disease from i2b2_2008_doc d inner join i2b2_2008_anno a on a.docId = d.docId and a.source = 'intuitive' where d.documentSet = 'train'

select *, 1 from ( select distinct c.code, d.docId from i2b2_2008_doc d inner join i2b2_2008_anno a on a.docId = d.docId and a.source = 'intuitive' inner join ytex.document yd on yd.uid = d.docId and yd.analysis_batch = 'i2b2.2008' inner join ytex.anno_base ac on ac.document_id = yd.document_id inner join ytex.anno_ontology_concept c on ac.anno_base_id = c.anno_base_id where d.documentSet = 'train' and a.disease = :label ) s
